nodes.text: The Cross-Shelf Corridor was carved in the ice of the planet Ilum and connected the Western Ice Shelf and the Western Jedi ruins.

Around 36312 BBY, the miners of the Minos-Mestra Corporation established several mining operations in the Eastern Ice Shelf and built the Foreman's camp in the Cross-Shelf Corridor. During the war against Zakuul, they accidentally desecrated the burial cite of Xivhkalrainik's father and his son, Sith Lord Xalek, slaughtered all people in the mining camps and then attacked the Foreman's camp. Miner Zon worked in this camp by that time.
The Cross-Shelf Corridor appears as an area on Ilum in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
